tags.name: api-authorization
tags.description: A custom element to render authorization editor rendering viuew based on AMF model.

properties.name: selected
properties.description: Currently selected method relative to `#selectedMethods` property.

properties.name: outlined
properties.description: Enables material's outlined theme for inputs.

properties.name: redirectUri
properties.description: Redirect URL for the OAuth2 authorization.

properties.name: methods
properties.description: A list of authorization methods read from the security definition.

properties.name: readOnly
properties.description: When set the editor is in read only mode.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: When set all controls are disabled in the form

properties.name: httpMethod
properties.description: Current HTTP method. Passed by digest method.

properties.name: requestUrl
properties.description: Current request URL. Passed by digest method.

properties.name: requestBody
properties.description: Current request body. Passed by digest method.
